Text.valUnicode: {\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1255\deff0\deflang1037{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Microsoft Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;\red255\green0\blue128;} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2510;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\ltrpar\cf1\lang1033\b\f0\fs20 In a RIA task, you can call different programs within the same subform.\par \par This is done using a \cf2 Call Operation properties->Destination\cf1 , The Destination points to the Control name of the Subform.\par \par You can also define whteher the focus will move to the called task or remain in the current task. \par \par This is done using a \cf2 Call Operation properties->Retain Focus\cf1 ,\par \par In this example, change the Task to Call field, then press Refresh. A new subtask will display within the subform.\par \par }

ExpSyntax.val: 'SB11_ How Do I Dynamically Replace the Content of a Subform?'
